mapper.select: SELECT /* mzlist.selectRestaurantInMzList */ A.RESTAURANT_ID, A.RESTAURANT_NAME, A.RESTAURANT_ADDRESS, A.RESTAURANT_CATEGORY FROM TB_RESTAURANT A JOIN TB_MZ_LIST_RESTAURANT_REL B ON A.RESTAURANT_ID = B.RESTAURANT_ID WHERE B.LIST_ID = #{mzListId}

SELECT /* mzlist.selectRestaurantInMzList */ A.RESTAURANT_ID, A.RESTAURANT_NAME, A.RESTAURANT_ADDRESS, A.RESTAURANT_CATEGORY FROM TB_RESTAURANT A WHERE A.RESTAURANT_ID NOT IN (SELECT RESTAURANT_ID FROM TB_MZ_LIST_RESTAURANT_REL WHERE LIST_ID = :mzListId)
